name: Button Runner
description:
The new guy in town shows up. He’s got nothing. No money. No skills. All he has is a dream. To run and jump farther than any controller head man before him. To score more points than any peripheral-cranium humanoid had thought possible before today.

Come up from nothing to set the high score! WASD and Arrow key controls. Some people say it controls better when they use both sets of keys, one with each hand. Should also have controller support. Make sure to extract both the .exe and the .pck from the zip file.
